CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'Corrosive Environment'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'High Radiation'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'Low Gravity'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'Low Atmosphere Pressure'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'High Temperatures'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'Low Temperatures'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'Crashing Atmosphere Pressure'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'Volcanic Activity'), 1, 0) + IF(INCLUDES(Hazardous_Issues__c, 'Crashing Gravity'), 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Hazard Count
